gurmukhi: AiDk ros kr ibsK clwey ]BUm Akws iCnk mih Cwey ]34]
transliteration: Adhik Ros Kar Bisakh Chadhaae|| Bhoom Akaas Chhinak Maih Chhaad||34||
translation: With great ire, he discharge his poisonous arrows, which spread over the earth and sky in an instant.34.

gurmukhi: bwxwvlI rudR jb swjI ]qb hI sYx dwnvI BwjI ]
transliteration: Baanaavalirudra Jab Saajee|| Tab Hisain Daanavibhaajee||
translation: When Rudra shot his arrows, the army of demons sped away.

gurmukhi: qb AMiDk isv swmuih DwXo ]duMd ju`Du rx m`iD mcwXo ]35]
transliteration: Tab Andhik Siv Saamuh(i) Dhaayo|| Dound Juddh(u) Ran Madhh(i) Machadyo||35||
translation: Then Andhakasura came in front of Shiva, a dreadful war ensured.35.

gurmukhi: bIs bwx iqn isvih pHwry kop kr ]lgy rudR ky gwq gey Eh Gwin kr ]
transliteration: Bees Baan Tin Sivah(i) Prahdare Kop Kar|| Lage Rudra Ke Gadt Gad Oh Ghaan(i) Kar||
translation: The demons, highly infuriated, discharged twenty arrows on Shiva, which struck the body of Shiva and wounded it.

gurmukhi: gih ipnwk kh pwx ipnwkI DwieXo ]ho quml ju`Du duhUMAn rx m`iD mcwieXo ]36]
transliteration: Gad(i) Pinaak Kah Paan Pinaakidhaaiyo|| Ho Toumal Juddh(u) Duhoonan Ran Maddh(i) Machaaiyo||36||
translation: Shiva also ran forward, holding his bow in his hand and a fearful war began between them.36.

gurmukhi: qwV sqR kh bhuir ipnwkI kopu huAY ]hxy dust kh bwx inKMg qy kwF duAY ]
transliteration: Taad Satra Kah Bahur(i) Pinaakikop(u) Huai|| Hane Doust Kah Baan Nikhanndte Kaadh Duai||
translation: Then Shiva took out tow arrow from his quiver, and aiming them at the tyrant, he discharged them in great anger.

gurmukhi: igirXo BUm BIqir isr s`qR pHwirXo ]ho jnk gwj kir kop burj kh mwirXo ]37]
transliteration: Giriyo Bhoom Bheetar(i) Sir Sattra Prahaariyo|| Ho Janak Gadj Kar(i) Kip Buraj Kah Maariyo||37||
translation: The arrows struck the head of the enemy and he fell down on the earth; he fell like a column falling flat on the ground having been hit by lightning.37.

gurmukhi: Gt eyk ibKY irp cyq BXo ]Dn bwx blI pun pwx lXo ]
transliteration: Ghat Ek Bikhai Rip Chet Bhayo|| Dhan Baan Balipoun Paan Layo||
translation: After one ghari (about 24 mintues), the enemy (Andhakasura) regained his senses and that mighty warrior again took bow and arrows in his hands.

gurmukhi: kr kop kuvMf krM krKXo ]sr Dwr blI Gn jXoN brKXo ]38]
transliteration: Kar Kop Kuvand Karan Karkhyo|| Sar Dhaar Balighan Jyon Barkhyo||38||
translation: The bow was pulled in his hands in great anger and a volley of arrows was showered like rain.38.

gurmukhi: kr kop blI brKXo ibsKM ]ieh Er lgy insry dusrM ]
transliteration: Kar Kop Balibarkhyo Bisakhannd|| Ih Or Lage Nisre Dousaran||
translation: In great ire, that mighty warrior began to discharge and shower his distinctively powerful arrows, which struck on one side came out from the other side.
